---
imports: import { Editor, EditorToolbar, Flex, BoldTool, ItalicTool, Button, RichEditor } from "@sparrowengg/twigs-react";
---

```tsx live play=editor-toolbar-custom
<Editor>
  <EditorToolbar>
    <Flex
      justifyContent="space-between"
      css={{
        marginBottom: "$3",
      }}
    >
      <Flex>
        <BoldTool
          renderButton={({ onChange, active, editor }) => {
            return (
              <Button
                onClick={() => {
                  onChange();
                }}
                color={active ? "primary" : "default"}
              >
                B
              </Button>
            );
          }}
        />
        <ItalicTool />
      </Flex>
      <Button>Save</Button>
    </Flex>
  </EditorToolbar>
  <RichEditor placeholder="Start typing" />
</Editor>
```
